Integrating ArchivesSpace and ArcLight

gregwiedeman.com/slides/integrate.html

Gregory Wiedeman
University Archivist
University at Albany, SUNY

Why use ASpace and ArcLight

  • Archives usability is poor
  • Need experimentation, iteration
  • Repository implementation

Things to try!

  • A single point of discovery
  • Use archival description for discovery of online content
    • Digitized material
    • Born-digital
    • Without item-level description

The Bigger Picture

  • Collection Context
    • Series Context
      • File record
        • Digital object
          • Automated metadata
          • OCR
          • Timestamps
          • Extracted entities

Why not ASpace PUI?

  • Complex for development
  • Includes both Archivist and User functionality
  • Customizations often affect other functions
  • ASpace is great for data intergration, but challenging to intergrate user experience with other systems

Integrations Principles

  • Separation of concerns
    • Do one thing
  • Boilerplate implementations
    • Try to keep integeration outside of systems
  • Networks of open systems

Why ArcLight

  • Does one thing
    • presents Solr data
    • Public-data only
  • Built for aggregate description
  • Familiar technology
  • Open API is useful

How do the connections work?

How do the connections work?

  • ASpace-ArcLight workflow
    • Overnight or manual EAD export
    • Uses ArchivesSnake!
    • Index shell script
    • Documentation
  • Collections Github repo

What does this look like?

  • Resource in ASpace
  • Collection in ArcLight
    • Individual levels
    • Blacklight features like facets
  • Single point of discovery
  • DAO in ASpace
  • Digital Object in Hyrax
  • Two-way client-side integration

Digital Object Upload

  • Upload a Commencement Program
  • Documentation

Limitations

Usability Issues

  • Tabs! Context! Loops!
  • Collections/Digital Selections
  • UAlbany ArcLight Update and Outlook
  • UAlbany ArcLight Usability Analysis
  • Addressed during ArcLight Phase II work cycle
  • UM Bentley Feedback
  • Could add new design features to ASpace PUI
